targets.rawSql:
CREATE TEMPORARY FUNCTION cached_url(url STRING)
RETURNS STRING
LANGUAGE js AS """
  if (url === null) {
    return null;
  }
  return "https://us-central1-kernelci-production.cloudfunctions.net/" +
         "kcidb_cache_redirect?" + encodeURIComponent(url);
""";

SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.checkout_id,
    builds.id,
    builds.origin,
    builds.comment,
    builds.architecture,
    IF(builds.config_name IS NULL, "unnamed", builds.config_name) AS config_name,
    IFNULL(cached_url(builds.config_url), "") AS config_url,
    IFNULL(CAST(builds.start_time AS STRING), "") AS start_time_str,
    IFNULL(
       FORMAT_TIME("%H:%M:%E3S", TIME_ADD(TIME "00:00:00", INTERVAL CAST((builds.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND)),
       ""
    ) as duration_str,
    CASE builds.valid WHEN false THEN 1 WHEN true THEN 0 ELSE -1 END AS valid_num,
    IF(builds.log_url IS NULL, "", "File") as log_url_text,
    cached_url(builds.log_url),
    builds.compiler,
    builds.command,
    checkouts.git_commit_hash,
    checkouts.patchset_hash,
    builds.misc,
    tests.status_num AS tests_status_num
FROM ${dataset}.builds AS builds
LEFT OUTER JOIN ${dataset}.checkouts AS checkouts
    ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        MAX((CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS status_num
    FROM ${dataset}.tests
    WHERE
        build_id = ${id:json} AND
        start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to) AND
        origin LIKE ${origin}
) AS tests ON TRUE
WHERE builds.id = ${id:json}

SELECT
    $__from + offset AS time,
    lines AS message
FROM UNNEST(
    SPLIT((SELECT REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(log_excerpt, "([^ ]) ", r'\1​ '), " ", " ​") FROM ${dataset}.builds WHERE id = ${id:json}), "\n")
) AS lines
WITH OFFSET AS offset
ORDER BY offset

SELECT
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "Root", ${test_path:json}) AS node_title,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "", "⮌ Parent") AS node_parent_title,
    IF(
        STRPOS(${test_path:json}, ".") = 0,
        "",
        LEFT(${test_path:json}, CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) - STRPOS(REVERSE(${test_path:json}), "."))
    ) AS node_parent_path,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", "", "⮌ Root") AS node_root_title,
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param

/* Massage */
SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    origins,
    path,
    IF(${test_path:json} = "", path, SUBSTR(path, CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) + 2)) AS name,
    tests,
    IFNULL(CAST(min_start_time AS STRING), "") AS min_start_time_str,
    IFNULL(
        FORMAT_TIME(
            "%H:%M:%E3S",
            TIME_ADD(
                TIME "00:00:00",
                INTERVAL DATETIME_DIFF(max_end_time, min_start_time, MILLISECOND) MILLISECOND
            )
        ),
        ""
    ) AS total_duration_str,
    status_num
FROM (
    /* Aggregate */
    SELECT
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ", ") AS origins,
        LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1) AS path,
        MIN(start_time) AS min_start_time,
        MAX(end_time) AS max_end_time,
        COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS tests,
        MAX((CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
            (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6) AS status_num
    FROM (
        /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
        SELECT
            tests.origin,
            tests.id,
            /* Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path */
            IFNULL(
                NULLIF(
                    /*
                     * Cut the test path up to and including the first dot
                     * after the currently-displayed test's path
                     */
                    LEFT(
                        tests.path,
                        INSTR(tests.path, ".", CHARACTER_LENGTH(${test_path:json}) + 2)
                    ),
                    ""
                ),
                tests.path || "."
            ) AS base_prefix,
            tests.start_time,
            TIMESTAMP_ADD(tests.start_time, INTERVAL CAST((tests.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND) AS end_time,
            tests.status,
            tests.waived
        FROM ${dataset}.tests
        WHERE
            tests.build_id = ${id:json} AND
            IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
            tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
            (${test_path:json} = "" OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
    )
    GROUP BY
        base_prefix
)
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    name ASC

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    IFNULL(tests.status, "UNKNOWN") AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM ${dataset}.tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = ${id:json} AND
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY metric

SELECT
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(0) AS time,
    tests.path AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS value
FROM ${dataset}.tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = ${id:json} AND
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    tests.status = "FAIL" AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
    IF(${origin} = "%", "All", ${origin}) AS origin_param,
    IF(${build_architecture} = "%", "All", ${build_architecture}) AS build_architecture_param,
    IF(${build_config_name} = "%", "All", ${build_config_name}) AS build_config_name_param,
    tests.id,
    tests.origin,
    tests.path,
    tests.comment,
    IFNULL(CAST(tests.start_time AS STRING), "") AS start_time_str,
    IFNULL(
        FORMAT_TIME("%H:%M:%E3S", TIME_ADD(TIME "00:00:00", INTERVAL CAST((tests.duration * 1000) AS INT64) MILLISECOND)),
        ""
    ) AS duration_str,
    (CASE status WHEN "ERROR" THEN 5 WHEN "FAIL" THEN 4 WHEN "PASS" THEN 3 WHEN "DONE" THEN 2 WHEN "SKIP" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) -
        (CASE waived WHEN false THEN 0 WHEN true THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) * 6 AS status_num
FROM ${dataset}.tests
WHERE
    tests.build_id = ${id:json} AND
    IFNULL(tests.start_time BETWEEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__from) AND TIMESTAMP_MILLIS($__to), TRUE) AND
    tests.origin LIKE ${origin} AND
    (${test_path:json} = "" OR tests.path = ${test_path:json} OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, ${test_path:json} || "."))
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC,
    tests.path ASC
